list.key: coadjutor with the right of succession
list.abs: he is always named by his predecessor , ie each metropolitan chooses a coadjutor with the right of succession .他总是叫他的前任，即每个都市圈选择一个教区助理与继承权。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from late Latin coadjutor, from co- (from Latin cum 'together with') + adjutor 'assistant' (from adjuvare 'to help')
